nodes.description: 伊斯兰国（IS）声称对东部Nangarhar省警察指挥官葬礼上的袭击负责
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State (IS) group said it was behind the attack on a police commander's funeral in Nangarhar, in the east of the country.

nodes.description: 医院遭遇袭击，但执行者身份尚未明确
nodes.support_text: It is still not clear who carried out the attack on the hospital

nodes.description: 塔利班否认参与医院袭击
nodes.support_text: the Taliban have denied any involvement

edges.support_text: the Taliban have denied any involvement
